REUTERS.UNKNOWN: A f0705 reute d f BC-MITSUI-AND-CO-TO-ISSU 03-05 0064

TEXT.TITLE: MITSUI AND CO TO ISSUE EURODOLLAR WARRANT BONDS
TEXT.BODY: Mitsui and Co Ltd said it plans to issue 300 mln Eurodollar warrant bonds in two tranches with payment on March 30 through a syndicate led by Nomura International Ltd. One tranche is of five-year, 150 mln dlr bonds while the rest is of seven-year, 150 mln dlr bonds, but other issue terms have not yet been decided. REUTER
